WeightedOnlineStats.jl

    Docstrings
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedAdaptiveBins
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedCovMatrix — Type.

    WeightedCovMatrix(T = Float64)

    Weighted covariance matrix, tracked as a matrix of type T.

    Example:

    o = fit!(WeightedCovMatrix(), rand(100, 4), rand(100))
sum(o)
mean(o)
var(o)
std(o)
cov(o)
cor(o)
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedHist — Type.

    Weighted Historgram

    Calculate a histogram of weighted data.

    Example

    # A weighted histogram with 4 bins:
o = fit!(WeightedHist(4), rand(1000), rand(1000))

mean(o)
var(o)
std(o)
median(o)
quantile(o, [0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.25, 1.0])
extrema(o)
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedHistAlgorithm
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedMean — Type.

    WeightedMean(T = Float64)

    Simple weighted mean, tracked as type T.

    Example:

    o = fit!(WeightedMean(), rand(100), rand(100))
sum(o)
mean(o)
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedOnlineStat
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedOnlineStats
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedSum — Type.

    WeightedSum(T = Float64)

    Simple weighted sum, tracked as type T.

    Example:

    o = fit!(WeightedSum(), rand(100), rand(100))
sum(o)
    WeightedOnlineStats.WeightedVariance — Type.

    WeightedVariance(T = Float64)

    Simple weighted variance, tracked as type T.

    Example:

    o = fit!(WeightedVariance(), rand(100), rand(100))
sum(o)
mean(o)
var(o)
std(o)
